definitions.definition: ( countable , South Asia ) A surname from India used by Hindu , Jain , Parsi and Sikh people throughout India .
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi , commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi, political and spiritual leader of India and the Indian independence movement, and proponent of nonviolence .

main_definition: ( countable , South Asia ) A surname from India used by Hindu , Jain , Parsi and Sikh people throughout India .
secondary_definitions: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi , commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi, political and spiritual leader of India and the Indian independence movement, and proponent of nonviolence .

definitions.definition: Someone living in accordance with the lifestyle or ethical principles of Mahatma Gandhi .

main_definition: Someone living in accordance with the lifestyle or ethical principles of Mahatma Gandhi .
